Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class ModelFlashCard extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • _cardColor

          java.awt.Color _cardColor
          The color of the card.

        • _frontData

          java.lang.String _frontData
          The String of the front of the card.

        • _backData

          java.lang.String _backData
          The String of the back of the card.

        • _ID

          int _ID
          The ID of the card, assigned by the deck it was added to. Used for finding and deletion. Can never be changed once assigned.

    • Class ModelFlashCardAllDecks extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • _completeDeck

          ModelFlashCardDeck _completeDeck
          The complete deck, stores all created card in order. _completeDeck copies all the cards stored here to the main deck when a user clicks the reset button.

        • _mainDeck

          ModelFlashCardDeck _mainDeck
          A changeable deck that stores created card that is also stored in main deck. Cards here can be dequeued and enqueued for displaying and moving back and forth. between _memorizedDeck and this.

        • _memorizedDeck

          ModelFlashCardDeck _memorizedDeck
          A changeable deck that allows the user to move cards from _mainDeck into this. The user can also move cards out of here back into _mainDeck

    • Class ModelFlashCardDeck extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • _deck

          ModelFlashCard[] _deck
          The array used to store all single flash cards.

        • _cardCounter

          int _cardCounter
          The total counts currently stored in ModelFlashCardDeck._deck.

        • _cardID

          int _cardID
          The current ID that was last assigned to a newly created card. This value will never decrement since it is required for card searching and deletion. There cannot be two cards with the same ID.

    • Class ViewDeckIconJPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • _cardCount

          int _cardCount
          Used in the algorithm to decide that color order of the flash cards to paint.

        • _isSelectedString

          java.lang.String _isSelectedString
          Paints a "Selected" string in the corner if selected.

        • _cardCountString

          java.lang.String _cardCountString
          Used to paint the card count string in the corner.

        • _isSelected

          boolean _isSelected
          Used to check if the deck is selected.

        • _isHover

          boolean _isHover
          Checks if the panel is being hovered over with a mouse so that the background color can be changed.

        • _deckTitle

          java.lang.String _deckTitle
          Stores the current title of the deck to be drawn during repaint().

        • g2d

          java.awt.Graphics2D g2d
          Graphics2D object used to paint everything.

        • _currentDeck

          ModelFlashCardDeck _currentDeck
          A copy of the current deck in reverse. Used by the painting algorithm to draw the flash cards in reverse order.

      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • _cardText

          javax.swing.JLabel _cardText
          The text that will be shown on the JPanel, could be text of the front or back data.

        • _lblCardSide

          javax.swing.JLabel _lblCardSide
          Indicated whether the card is showing contents of the front of the card or the back.

        • _lblCardID

          javax.swing.JLabel _lblCardID
          Indicates the ID of the card being displayed.

        • _southPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel _southPanel
          Lower JPanel used for storing _lblCardSide and _lblCardID.
